sentences.en: A lack of oxygen may inhibit brain development in the unborn child.
sentences.cn: 缺氧可能阻碍胎儿的大脑发育。

sentences.en: An unhappy family life may inhibit children’s learning.
sentences.cn: 不幸福的家庭生活可能会阻碍儿童的学习。

sentences.en: Aryl disulfides, for example, inhibit polyolefin oxidation.
sentences.cn: 例如芳基二硫化物可抑制聚烯烃的氧化.

sentences.en: Conclusion The Burn - scald tincture of herb can inhibit the acute inflammation.
sentences.cn: 结论消炎烧烫酊对急性炎症有抑制作用.

sentences.en: Conclusion The exogenous CGRP can inhibit pulmonary hemorrhage induced by ET - 1 .
sentences.cn: 结论外源性CGRP有拮抗ET -1 致肺出血的作用.

sentences.en: Conclusion Δ Np 63 - shRNA can effectively inhibit the expres - sion of Δ Np 63 mRNA in 5637 cell line.
sentences.cn: 结论Np63特异性shRNA在5637细胞中对Np63mRNA表达显示出很好的抑制作用.

sentences.en: Curcumin can inhibit the proliferation of hfRPE cells by cells cycle arrest.
sentences.cn: 结论:在一定浓度范围内,姜黄素通过改变hfRPE细胞的周期分布来抑制其增殖.

sentences.en: Higher salt concentrations alone may inhibit ion uptake.
sentences.cn: 单单只是盐浓度高就会阻碍离子吸收.

sentences.en: It could inhibit the poor from getting the medical care they need.
sentences.cn: 那会使穷人得不到他们所需要的医疗保健。

sentences.en: Many surgical complications and disease processes inhibit normal nitrogen anabolism.
sentences.cn: 许多外科并发症和疾病抑制正常的氮合成代谢.

sentences.en: Swishing green tea around the mouth may inhibit cavity - causing bacteria.
sentences.cn: 以绿茶漱口可能抑制导致牙齿空洞的细菌.

sentences.en: The ability of humoral antibodies to inhibit tumor growth varies with different cell types.
sentences.cn: 体液抗体抑制肿瘤生长的能力因细胞类型不同而异.

sentences.en: The high cost of borrowing is inhibiting investment by industry in new equipment.
sentences.cn: 高昂的借贷成本正抑制行业对新设备的投资。

sentences.en: The interplay between the new politics and the modern media will unbalance the political process and inhibit its workings.
sentences.cn: 新政治和现代媒体之间的相互作用将会扰乱政治进程，妨碍其正常运作。

sentences.en: The use of wax to inhibit ozone deterioration probably goes back to 1881.
sentences.cn: 使用蜡来抑制臭氧劣化可追溯到1881年.

sentences.en: Waterproof layer to prevent moisture, inhibit the growth of mold.
sentences.cn: 防水层能防止潮气, 抑制霉菌的生长.

sentences.en: Wine or sugary drinks inhibit digestion.
sentences.cn: 葡萄酒或含糖饮料抑制消化。

words.tran_cn: [助剂] 抑制剂，抗化剂；抑制者

trans.tran_en: to prevent something from growing or developing well

trans.tran_cn: 阻止， 妨碍， 抑制
trans.tran_en: to prevent something from growing or developing well
